review_title: It's for a very specific pool of students
job_title: Associate Professor in Lake Wales, FL
pros: Warner is a very family-oriented, very family-friendly place. They honestly care about the well-being of their employees.
cons:
Very low pay in comparison with other institutions. Very little ability to attract star candidates, tend to hire incestuously from their alumni pool. Warner's president has decided to join the fundamentalist movement. He has aligned the University with creationists and other "literalist" folk and that has meant targeting dissenters. So a conservative Christian college with ambitions to spread the light has become a quasi-fundamentalist college that discourages dissent and liberal arts education.
In recent years, management has become obsessed with student "satisfaction." that often means that if you are doing your job and students are unhappy with you, you are actively criticized for not "reaching" the students.

pros:
Working with students was definitely the biggest pro. 
Being able to serve the community

Christian values
cons:

Not much room for advancement
